hdjs: The right of interpretation of the event belongs to the platform
r0: 1. How to join: Send lucky gifts in live room;
r1: 2. The top 20 in Lucky giftswill be rewarded every day based on the daily ranking (UTC+8). And the top 3 can get frame for 24 hours, winners can manually collect the rewards the second day;
r2: 3. When your points less than 100000, the daily ranking reward will be half of the normal reward;
r3: 4. Each user can only receive reward once. If multiple accounts are on the list at the same time, the reward will be issued according to the highest ranking
